posts.title: Install Scripts
posts.text: Run these if you have not yet installed homebrew and/or node.js # If you have not installed homebrew, run this: ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)"# Afterwards, if you have not installed node.js, run this:brew install node Run this if you have not installed hexo # Now install hexonpm install -g hexo-cli Run these to prepare a hexo blog in a new folder # create a new folder and go to it to install hexo sitemkdir my-blogcd my-blog# Install hexo in folder my-bloghexo init# Install the packages that you need for this sitenpm install hexo-renderer-org --save # org-renderernpm install hexo-browsersync --save # auto-sync site on browser when editing contentsnpm install hexo-deployer-git --save # deploy on github# install hipaper themegit clone https://github.com/iTimeTraveler/hexo-theme-hipaper.git themes/hipaper# install generate json plugin for insight search pluginnpm install -S hexo-generator-json-content Run this to start the server hexo server --open Author: Ioannis Zannos Created: 2017-05-10 Wed 18:57 Emacs 25.1.1 (Org mode 8.2.10) Validate

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
